00063 size_t LinearInterpolation::interpolate(const std::vector <FrameWithId>& in, std::vector <FrameWithId>& out, double step, size_t numberOfsteps = 0) {
00064 #ifdef DEBUG
00065     Stopwatch stopwatch;
00066     stopwatch.start();
00067 #endif
00068     size_t result = linearInterpolation(in, out, step, numberOfsteps);
00069 #ifdef DEBUG  
00070     stopwatch.stop();
00071     LOG("Linear interpolation:");
00072     if (result > 0) {
00073         LOG("  - input end point: %f, %f", in.back().getFrame().p.x(), in.back().getFrame().p.y());
00074         LOG("  - output end point: %f, %f", out.back().getFrame().p.x(), out.back().getFrame().p.y());
00075     }
00076     LOG("  - step size: %f", step);
00077     LOG("  - iterations : %lu", result);
00078     LOG("  - duration : %f ms", stopwatch.getElapsedTime());
00079 
00080 #endif  
00081     return result;
00082 }
00083 
00084 size_t LinearInterpolation::linearInterpolation(const std::vector <FrameWithId>& in,
00085         std::vector <FrameWithId>& out,
00086         double step,
00087         size_t numberOfSteps = 0) {
00088 
00089     if (in.empty())
00090         return 0;
00091 
00092     size_t counter = 0;
00093     out.clear();
00094     std::vector <FrameWithId> localCopy = in;
00095     double x0, y0, z0, xn, yn, zn, x, y, z, r, p;
00096 
00097 
00098     for (size_t i = 0; i < localCopy.size() - 1; ++i) {
00099         x0 = localCopy[i].getFrame().p.x();
00100         y0 = localCopy[i].getFrame().p.y();
00101         localCopy[i].getFrame().M.GetRPY(r, p, z0);
00102 
00103         xn = localCopy[i + 1].getFrame().p.x();
00104         yn = localCopy[i + 1].getFrame().p.y();
00105         localCopy[i + 1].getFrame().M.GetRPY(r, p, zn);
00106 
00107         double distance = sqrt((xn - x0)*(xn - x0) + (yn - y0)*(yn - y0));
00108         size_t steps = static_cast<size_t> (floor(distance / step));
00109         if (steps == 0) {
00110             LOG("Warning: step = 0, interpolation is not possible");
00111             return counter;
00112         }
00113         LOG("x0=%f, y0=%f, xn=%f, yn=%f", x0, y0, xn, yn);
00114         LOG("distance=%f, steps=%lu", distance, steps);
00115 
00116         for (size_t v = 0; v <= steps; ++v) {
00117             x = x0 + (xn - x0) / steps*v;
00118             y = y0 + (yn - y0) / steps*v;
00119             z = z0 + (zn - z0) / steps*v;
00120 
00121             LOG("x=%f, y=%f", x, y);
00122 
00123             KDL::Frame frame;
00124             std::string id = localCopy[i].id;
00125             frame.p.x(x);
00126             frame.p.y(y);
00127             frame.p.z(z);
00128             frame.M.DoRotZ(z);
00129             out.push_back(FrameWithId(frame,id));
00130             ++counter;
00131             if (counter >= (numberOfSteps - 1) && numberOfSteps != 0) {
00132                 return counter;
00133             }
00134         }
00135 
00136 
00137     }
00138 
00139 
00140 
00141     return counter;
00142 
00143 }
